SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game, holding their state including nickname, color, score, playing hand, initial card, hidden goal, visible symbols, game board, placement order, and possible placements.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname)
      Constructs a new player with the specified nickname. Initializes the playing hand, visible symbols, game board, placement order, possible placements, and diagonals.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname

  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play(int cardIndex, boolean front, int x, int y) throws InvalidPositioningException, RequirementsNotMetException
      Plays a card from the player's hand at the specified position on the game board.
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - the index of the card in the player's hand
      front - whether the front side of the card should be played
      x - the x-coordinate on the game board
      y - the y-coordinate on the game board
      Throws:
      InvalidPositioningException - if the position is invalid
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the card's requirements are not met

    • playInitialCard

      public void playInitialCard(boolean front)
      Plays the initial card at the center of the game board.
      Parameters:
      front - whether the front side of the card should be played

    • draw

      public void draw(PlayableCard card) throws AlreadyDrawnException
      Draws a card and adds it to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be drawn
      Throws:
      AlreadyDrawnException - if the player has already drawn the maximum number of cards

    • setPlayingHand

      public void setPlayingHand(ResourceCard card1, ResourceCard card2, GoldCard card3)
      Sets the player's hand with the specified cards.
      Parameters:
      card1 - the first resource card
      card2 - the second resource card
      card3 - the gold card
